pr_title: Another attempt to try to understand what's going on with the JMS quickstart in native

timeline.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText:
There are no logger. We already have System.out in the test resource, so discarded the use of it.
Hopefully, once I understand the issue, this will be reverted.
replies.author: cescoffier

timeline.message:
Log when a message is received.

The native build gets 204 response instead of 200 response, showing that the message is not received from JMS.
A message is sent every 5 seconds, but do not seem to be received. Trying to understand why...

Log when a message is received.

The native build gets 204 response instead of 200 response, showing that the message is not received from JMS.
A message is sent every 5 seconds, but do not seem to be received. Trying to understand why...
Wait for the AMQP server to be started
